resources.string: Ushanka
Warm and cosy ushanka hat decorated with classy red star. A perfect companion for a comrade in a cold dungeon.
Vampire skull
This mask is made of an all natural vampire skull. In fact that is a vampire skull... of a big headed vampire. Spooky.
Zombie mask
candy
This candy looks so pretty and it smells good too. Do you really need to give it to someone else?
You shouldn't have eaten that candy. You promised to give it to someone else. It doesn't seem to affected you in any way though, your hunger wont go away, it's just candy after all.
Now you really had to much. Your tummy hurts because you ate to much candy.
pumpkin pie
A delicious pumpkin pie, just like your mom used to bake.
rotten pumpkin pie
Not matter how good it was when it was fresh, there is no way it's still edible.
Candle Of Visions
The candle lighted up the moment you took out of your backpack. The flame emits faint purple light, and as you look through it the nearby monsters becomes visible to you.
The candle has burned out, it no longer lights up when you hold it. Looks like you can't use it anymore.
barrel
Looks like a simple wooden barrel. As you get closer you can smell faint hint of oil. The barrel seems to be fairly light, you might be able to push it.
pumpkin
It's really weird and spooky to see a carved pumpkin laying around in the dungeon. You can feel a certain danger, approaching that thing. But you can always push it away, right?
